tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
**26 GHz Vector Network Analyzer Tender Announcement**
======================================================

**Government Contract**
------------------------

The Government of Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of 26 GHz Vector Network Analyzers.

**Reference Information**
------------------------

*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01015769
*   **Solicitation Number:** 20221216
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-12-02
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-16T00:00:00

**Procurement Description**
-------------------------

This solicitation and resulting contract are issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC (category 3.50 vector network analyzer) and all terms and conditions of the SA apply. The contractor is requested to submit a bid for all items listed at Annex “A” attached.

**Key Deliverables and Requirements**
-----------------------------------

*   26 GHz PNA network analyzer (N5222B-N5222B)
*   4-port with second source, configurable test set, reference mixer switch (N5222B-N5222B-401)
*   Add IF inputs (N5222B-N5222B-020)
*   Rack mount kit for installation with handles (N5222B-N5222B-1CP)
*   Frequency-offset measurements (S93080B-S93080B)
*   Fast CW measurements (S93118B-S93118B)
*   Device measurement eXpert - DMX (S94601B-S94601B)

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**
---------------------------

The tender evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

*   Technical compliance to the requirement presented herein and at Annex “A”
*   Technical compliance of equivalent (substitute) product(s) offered
*   Quote firm prices in Canadian dollars, DDP (destination) with freight charges included

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

The following trade agreements will be applied to this tender:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

The procurement applies to all regions within Canada.

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

The goods will be delivered to the Innovation, Science and Economic
